name: snoozeplus-intercom-integration
description: Inbox integration for Intercom to automate delayed responses to customers.

scripts.dev: npm run lint && dotenvx run --env-file=.env.local -- nodemon src/app.js
scripts.copy-app: cp -r src/ dist/SnoozePlus/ && cp package.json dist/SnoozePlus/package.json
scripts.copy-extras: cp .env.production dist/SnoozePlus/.env && cp README.md dist/README.md && cp -rp scripts/ dist/
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run copy-app && npm run copy-extras
scripts.start: npm install && dotenvx run --env-file=.env -- node app.js
